headline: Why Micron Stock Is Soaring Today
summary: Micron Technology (NASDAQ: MU) stock is posting big gains Thursday amid a positive indicator for its industry and bullish momentum for the broader market.  The S&P 500 and the Nasdaq Composite were up 1.9% and 2.6%, respectively.  Micron's valuation is jumping today after fellow memory-chip player SK Hynix posted strong first-quarter results driven by artificial intelligence (AI) tailwinds.

headline: Micron Stock Is Rising. How Earnings From a Rival Are Helping.
summary: Micron stock is far below the highs of more than $140 it reached last year as investors have lost confidence in the artificial-intelligence trend.
